org.intellimate.izou.sdk.properties

Class EventPropertiesAssistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.util.AddOnModule
      • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.properties.EventPropertiesAssistant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Identifiable, ContextProvider, Loggable, LoggedExceptionCallback, ReloadableFile, ExceptionCallback

    public class EventPropertiesAssistant
extends AddOnModule
implements ReloadableFile
    EventPropertiesManager manages all events written in the local_events.properties file. You can register (add) events to the file, and get events from the file. The file pretty much serves as a hub for event IDs.

      • registerEventID

        public void registerEventID(String description,
                            String key,
                            String value)
        Registers or adds an event to the local_events.properties file
        Parameters:
        description - a simple description of the Event
        key - the key with which to store the event ID
        value - the complete event ID

      • unregisterEventID

        public void unregisterEventID(String eventKey)
        Unregisters or deletes an event from the local_events.properties file
        Parameters:
        eventKey - the key under which the complete event ID is stored in the properties file
